## Question 3
```{r}
library(lmtest)
model = lm(salary ~ educ + salbegin + male + minority, data = data2)
model2 = lm(log(salary) ~ educ + log(salbegin) + male + minority, data = data2)

resettest(model); resettest(model2)
```
